Plot: When Max makes an preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.
Title: A Goofy Movie
Writer: Jymn Magon (story), Jymn Magon (screenplay), Chris Matheson (screenplay), Brian Pimental (screenplay), Brian Pimental (story), Curtis Armstrong (additional written material), John Doolittle (additional written material)
Actors: Bill Farmer, Jason Marsden, Jim Cummings, Kellie Martin
